Plains.description: Open, flat ground, offering no penalties or bonuses.

Forest.description: Dense woodland, slowing movement but providing cover and reducing visibility.

Hill.description: Elevated ground, offering a commanding view and defensive bonuses.

River.description: Flowing water, significantly impeding movement. Crossing may require special abilities or bridges (future feature).

Swamp.description: Marshy, difficult terrain that slows movement and can affect unit morale.

Mountain.description: Impassable or very difficult terrain for most units, providing significant defensive positions.
